column1: Teykovo (Russian: Те́йково) is a town in Ivanovo Oblast
column3: located on the Vyazma River 35 kilometers (22 mi) southwest of Ivanovo. Population: 34

column1: It was founded in the 17th century and was granted town status in 1918.
Within the framework of administrative divisions
column2: Teykovo serves as the administrative center of Teykovsky District
column3: even though it is not a part of it. As an administrative division
column4: it is incorporated separately as the Town of Teykovo—an administrative unit with the status equal to that of the districts. As a municipal division
column5: the Town of Teykovo is incorporated as Teykovo Urban Okrug.

column1: The town is home to a Strategic Missile Division of the Strategic Rocket Forces where projects like the mobile Topol-M intercontinental ballistic missile system are operated from.
Ивановская областная Дума. Закон №145-ОЗ от 14 декабря 2010 г. «Об административно-территориальном устройстве Ивановской области»
column2: в ред. Закона №2-ОЗ от 4 февраля 2015 г. «Об отдельных вопросах правового регулирования в сфере присвоения наименований географическим объектам и переименования географических объектов на территории Ивановской области». Вступил в силу через 10 дней после дня официального опубликования. Опубликован: "Собрание законодательства Ивановской области"

column5: 2010 On the Administrative-Territorial Structure of Ivanovo Oblast

column7: 2015 On Various Issues of the Legal Regulation in the Area of Assigning Names to Geographical Objects and Renaming the Geographical Objects on the Territory of Ivanovo Oblast. Effective as of the day which is 10 days after the official publication.).
